// yuml.me
[CacheDecorator|-cache:Cache;-provider:Provider|+get(k:Key):Resource{bg:blue}]
[Cache|-data:Map(Key_Resource)|+get(k:Key):Resource;+put(k:Key_r:Resource);contains(k:Key):boolean{bg:green}]
[note: get_resource_from_cache;otherwise_call_provider{bg:cornsilk}]-.-[CacheDecorator]
[ProviderImpl|+get(k:Key):Resource{bg:green}]
[Resource{bg:red}]
[Client]->[Provider]
[Client]use->[Resource]
[Provider|+get(k:Key):Resource{bg:purple}]
[Cache]save->[Resource]
[CacheDecorator]save resource->[Cache]
[CacheDecorator]get if not contain->[ProviderImpl]
[CacheDecorator]impl-.-^[Provider]
[ProviderImpl]impl-.-^[Provider]
[ProviderImpl]provide->[Resource]
[Client{bg:yellow}]
